title: FP91G
author: FP91G
created_time: November 29, 2023, 09:57:23 AMLast edit: December 08, 2023, 10:10:25 AM by FP91G
content: We are a fork of the kaspa network with ASIC resistancehttps://karlsencoin.com/Kaspa is a gemWe want to rely on small miners instead of big farm for a better decentralizationCurrent kaspa ASICs are not compatible with Karlsen and we will enforce this resistanceOur second motivation is to work tokens integration (erc-20 equivalent) on the networkmore in the incoming whitepaperpoolshttps://baikalmine.comhttps://e4pool.comwallethttps://github.com/karlsen-network/karlsend/releasesthe hardest thing is to make a walletQuotestep 1get the binaries or build from sourceshttps://github.com/karlsen-network/karlsend (check releases)step2run and sync a node./karlsend --utxoindexstep3when the node is synced create a wallet./karlsenwallet createnote your seed phrase./karlsenwallet dump-unencrypted-datastep4run the wallet daemon (in a dedicated shell)./karlsenwallet start-daemonand request an address./karlsenwallet new-addressstep5start mining./karlsenminer --miningaddr=karlsen:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxfor gpu mining - get the miner on github  https://github.com/karlsen-network/karlsen-miner./karlsen-miner --mining-address karlsen:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxminersSRBMiner 2.4.1 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5190081Karlsen-miner: https://github.com/karlsen-network/karlsen-miner/releases/tag/v0.0.3-betaexchangeshttps://tradeogre.com/exchange/KLS-USDThttps://trade.exbitron.com/trade?market=kls-usdthttps://trade.exbitron.com/trade?market=kls-ltchttps://trade.exbitron.com/trade?market=kls-btchttps://nonkyc.io/market/KLS_USDThttps://xeggex.com/market/KLS_USDT

comments.body: Quote from: safar1980 on December 05, 2023, 11:04:53 AMIt is impossible to enter coins into my account due to an error in creating an address for the coin.Where are you getting this error from? Tradeogre or somewhere else?On TrageOgre, I didn't get any problem generating the address for the coin. If this mini bull pump continues, the coin might also perform well.

comments.author: emwiz
comments.body: Why there was a delay in publishing the coin to bitcointalk. I think the coin was mined by dev before publishing it.Is that same as premine?

I think the coin was mined by dev before publishing it.Is that same as premine?This is not premine. I wrote about this coin on November 29, but many abandoned it due to difficulties with installing a wallet.Now you need to take risks for profit and be more active in the mining communities.KARLSEN LISTED ON EXBITRONhttps://trade.exbitron.com/trade?market=kls-usdthttps://trade.exbitron.com/trade?market=kls-ltchttps://trade.exbitron.com/trade?market=kls-btc

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: MOBILE WALLET for karlsencoin(KLS)https://github.com/e4p1k0/karlsen_mobile/releaseshttps://t.me/koliamainer/9808Miners say that this wallet was developed by a team from the e4pool mining pool.The wallet has not been verified, although I have seen reviews from miners that they have been using it for several days and nothing suspicious has been found.Use at your own risk.

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: All pools have a minimum payout of 50-100 coins, and k1pool has only 20 coins, so that you have time to get profit from 1 farm on the exchangeHow To Start Mining Karlsenhttps://k1pool.com/pool/karlsen/how-to-starthttps://k1pool.com/ru/pool/karlsen

comments.author: Metroid
comments.body: White paper says this coin will be gpumining only but who knows. Let's hope. It seems this coin was created based on kaspa GhostDAG protocol. I recommend this project for long term at the moment, other algo that I recommend at this moment is kawpow, coins mainly, xna, rvn, mewc.

comments.body: new listinghttps://xeggex.com/market/KLS_USDTI collected a list of all exchanges in the first postDaily emission of this coin is 4,320,000 KLS or $760 000I thought that the price would fall very quickly, but probably the miners are not selling this coin, otherwise I don’t know why the price is not falling.

Ill pass for this one, it will be really hard to push the 1$ mark I think.The hashrate is growing very much, but so far this is the best coin for many GPU miners.https://hashrate.no/coins/KLS/hashrate677 TH/s is 162,311 RTX 4090 video cards or 1,065,000 RTX 3060 video cards. Most ASIC manufacturers for Кaspa are already thinking about adding a new algorithm for their devices.

comments.author: VasilyS
comments.body: All the signs of fraud are there: most KLS transactions go to exchanges, where the price is artificially pumped, in real life no one uses this shitcoin. Information about the distribution of Karlsen coins among wallets is hidden. This project does not bring anything new, no one from the team shows their face, White Book is a bunch of buzzwords, there is zero uniqueness. What is this – money laundering?

comments.author: Metroid
comments.body: Quote from: VasilyS on December 09, 2023, 01:14:51 PMAll the signs of fraud are there: most KLS transactions go to exchanges, where the price is artificially pumped, in real life no one uses this shitcoin. Information about the distribution of Karlsen coins among wallets is hidden. This project does not bring anything new, no one from the team shows their face, White Book is a bunch of buzzwords, there is zero uniqueness. What is this – money laundering?Any coin that is released when everything is going up brings many questions, however this is not a pos coin or a token, this is a pow coin so as it stands is a lot safer to invest.

comments.author: babymethyl2013
comments.body: this screams FPGA only and the pumpers have a lot of USDT**I suspect its the old Txbit.io crew looking to make money after they were shut down.most of the coins they had listed on there were secretly FPGA only while the simps were mingling with GPUs

comments.author: ccplz
comments.body: let's say I was holding kaspa while this fork was created, can I claim an amount of KLS equal to the kaspa I was holding? if so, how

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: What's newNew pools for minersListing on CoingecoAdded delta trackerMiner updatesDual mining on RigelWhitepepperWeb walletAlmost 70,000 miners670 Th networkPrice 0.12https://t.me/KartavKanaLL/10291

comments.author: fapar
comments.body: Quote from: safar1980 on December 11, 2023, 01:38:48 PMWhat's newNew pools for minersListing on CoingecoAdded delta trackerMiner updatesDual mining on RigelWhitepepperWeb walletAlmost 70,000 miners670 Th networkPrice 0.12https://t.me/KartavKanaLL/10291For beginners and for saving time, mobile and web wallets are very convenient. But to store coins, I would only trust the wallet (seed phrase) created through the console karlsenwallet. However, when synchronizing blocks via karlsend, disconnects occur quite often (I don’t understand what caused them) and the daemon begins synchronization not from the break point (the last block) but from the very beginning. I spent about two hours to successfully synchronize.
